**Example 1: 开启实例的GTID**



Input: 

```
tccli cdb OpenDBInstanceGTID --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId cdb-f35wr6wj
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "6EF60BEC-0242-43AF-BB20-270359FB54A7",
        "AsyncRequestId": "e48eb1e9-0ca0ecae-c0dac9c7-60d12864"
    }
}
```
